name: Midgard Castles
description:
Demo of my Kings arthur gold interpretation during My First Game Jam 2023 Winter.

Features :

- 4 class : rogue, warrior, cleric, builder

- dig, Place bloc

- randomly generated fields (trees, herbs, stone bloc, dirt bloc)

- timing 15:00 to play, scoring : the team with the more frag wins

TODO :

- Jumping smoothly without a character controller (I use PUN)

- Building structure like rest building or barricades

- Some bugs to fix
